description:
Keeping kids feet happy in the cold won’t be hard with these socks. With merino wool to keep them warm and dry and 4 degree fit for a locked in feel, they won’t want to take them off.

  • 4 Degree™ elite fit system combines two elastics so you get a snug fit and precise control while on the slopes
  • Indestructawool™ blend improves durability in high-wear areas
  • Shred Shield™ technology reinforces the toe box
  • Mesh vent zones provide temperature and moisture management
  • Wider welt for a secure and pillowy fit
name: Smartwool Ski Zero Cushion Tie Dye Print OTC Socks - Youths
